title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics      Park Size:  1007 acres (as of 2010)  Annual Visitation:     Total Visits: 705,397 (Fiscal Year 2010)  Recreational: 208,887 Annual Budget: $1,516,000.00 Staff: 14 Full Time Employees (FTE) National Designation:   National Military Park:March 26, 1928  National Battlefield:August 16, 1985  Infrastructure:    Roads: 3 Miles  Bridges: 3 Footbridges  Buildings: 13 Recreational Resources:  Visitor Center: 1  Hiking Trails: 5.7 Miles  Picnic Tables: 13
